```html
JavaScript Weekly - August 1, 2025 (#747)

Key Highlights:

  • Observable Notebooks 2.0: A major advancement in reactive JavaScript notebooks for data visualization, now based on HTML and supporting vanilla JavaScript with import capabilities.
  • Node.js v22.18 (LTS): Features type stripping and TypeScript support enabled by default, allowing direct execution of .ts files.
  • AI Code Reviews: CodeRabbit offers free AI-powered code reviews within IDEs like VS Code, Cursor, and Windsurf.
  • JavaScript Runtimes: An in-depth look at the evolution of JavaScript runtimes over the past decade, including Node.js, Bun, and more.

In Brief:

  • Simon Willison created a JavaScript 'Space Invaders' game using a locally run LLM.
  • npm now supports secure package publishing from CI/CD using OpenID Connect.
  • Stack Overflow 2025 survey shows JavaScript as the most used language, React as the top frontend library.
  • Tailwind Plus now supports vanilla JavaScript.

Notable Releases:

  • pnpm 10.14
  • Node-RED 4.1
  • Ionic 8.7
  • Storybook 9.1
  • TypeScript 5.9 RC
  • ESLint v9.32.0
  • Preact 10.27
  • Angular 20.1.4
  • Deno 2.4.3
  • React 19.1.1

Featured Articles & Videos:

  • Zod vs. Valibot: A JS/TS Validator Comparison (Jack Herrington)
  • Compiling Svelte 5 Code (Tan Li Hau)
  • SaaS Architecture: Multi-Tenant vs. Single-Tenant (Clerk)
  • JavaScript Logical Assignment Operators (Matt Smith)
  • Making Sense of the Performance Extensibility API (Harry Roberts)
  • Bun Creator on Building Bun and Node.js Compatibility (Patrick Akil & Jarred Sumner)
  • Multi-Repository TypeScript Problem (David Moores)
  • vi.mock is a Footgun: Why vi.spyOn Should Be Your Default (Brendan McLoughlin)
  • Building 2D Game-Style Physics with Matter.js and React Native Skia (Daniel Friyia)

Code & Tools:

  • Dependency Cruiser 17: Visualize Project Dependencies
  • TanStack DB: Embedded Client Database for TanStack Query
  • Embrace: Connect Performance and Reliability to User Engagement
  • AudioTee.js: macOS System Audio Capture for Node.js
  • Ghost 6.0 RC
  • Ink 6.1
  • Cytoscape.js 3.33
  • eslint-plugin-vue 10.4
  • Axios 1.11
  • InversifyJS 7.7

Classifieds:

  • Meticulous: Automated E2E UI Test Suite Creation
  • KeyLines: JavaScript Graph Visualization Toolkit

Bonus Items:

  • Google Sans Code: A new open-licensed code font from Google.
  • NPKILL: A tool for cleaning up node_modules folders.
  • Speculation Rules API: Improves site loading speed (Chromium-based browsers).
  • Isaac Z. Schlueter (npm creator) is available for hire for JavaScript projects.
  • Computerphile video on building text editors.
  • A blog built using C preprocessor macros.
```
